subject: RE: Stripe Account
preview: Hi Patrick,    Yes it will be good to double check with Stripe, I don't see why the discounted fee would not apply in the testing environment also.    Thanks and speak soon,

full_threads.body:
Hi Patrick, 


Yes it will be good to double check with Stripe, I don't see why the discounted fee would not apply in the testing environment also. 


Thanks and speak soon,

Hi Heath,


Morning. Should I go back to Stripe on the fees charged? I do not think the fees charged in the test environment is what I have agreed with Stripe.


Thanks



Patrick Foong


Head of Finance


MS Research Australia


02-8413 7914 • 1300 356 467


Fax:02-8413 7999


pfoong@msra.org.au www.msra.org.au


Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ [mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au]
Sent: Wednesday, 4 July 2018 12:19 PM
To: Petricia Augustus <paugustus@msra.org.au>
Cc: Patrick Foong <pfoong@msra.org.au>; Emma Bonehill <ebonehill@msra.org.au>; Nadya Lyssenko <nlyssenko@msra.org.au>; Support - WP Perk <support@wpperk.com>
Subject: Re: Stripe Account


Hi Trish,


It’s to do with recurring billing, the single donation is working fine, we are yet to configure recurring.


I’ll let you know once it’s done, in the meantime you can test the single donation options.


Thanks, HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271


https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png

OK then. I’ll test a couple more times then just on the one off donation.



Petricia Augustus


Head of Communications, Marketing and Operations


MS Research Australia


02 8413 7910 • 1300 356 467


paugustus@msra.org.au • www.msra.org.au


Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060

Subject: Re: Stripe Account

Hi Trish,


It’s to do with recurring billing, the single donation is working fine, we are yet to configure recurring.


I’ll let you know once it’s done, in the meantime you can test the single donation options.


Thanks,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png

Hi Heath and Patrick

I processed the first test donation as a one off donation and it worked fine and displayed in Stripe, however when I went to test a second time I received the below error message.

I selected $500, regular gift of half yearly plus the extra merchant fee.

Sorry I have come to a halt and cannot continue testing.

Please advise when this has been rectified and I can try again.

Thanks

Trish

Petricia Augustus

Head of Communications, Marketing and Operations

MS Research Australia

02 8413 7910 • 1300 356 467

paugustus@msra.org.au • www.msra.org.au

Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060

From: Patrick Foong
Sent: Wednesday, 4 July 2018 11:33 AM
To: Emma Bonehill <ebonehill@msra.org.au>; Nadya Lyssenko <nlyssenko@msra.org.au>; Petricia Augustus <paugustus@msra.org.au>
Subject: FW: Stripe Account

Thanks for volunteering to test MS Research Australia via Stripe Account.

Could you test a few transactions follow instructions from Heath?

When you have logged into Stripe Account, look for “Viewing test data” on the left hand side of your screen and switch it on. And then go into “Payments” and select “filter” for the reporting period.

Thanks and good luck.

Patrick Foong

Head of Finance

MS Research Australia

02-8413 7914 • 1300 356 467

Fax:02-8413 7999

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ [mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au]
Sent: Tuesday, 3 July 2018 5:21 PM
To: Patrick Foong <pfoong@msra.org.au>
Cc: Petricia Augustus <paugustus@msra.org.au>
Subject: Re: Stripe Account

Hi Patrick,

Thanks for activating the Stripe account yesterday.

We have now hooked up the testing form to your Stripe account. Please note it’s running in TEST MODE currently, i.e. your ‘credit card’ won’t actually be charged.

  1. Please visit: https://staging-msra.kinsta.com/donate/ to test the donation form with Stripe as the credit card provider
  2. Enter the credit card number 4242 4242 4242 4242 / Any future expiry date / Any 3 digits for the CCV number.
  3. You will then see the donation go through as normal and receive the emails and notifications etc.
  4. To view the transaction in Stripe, login and make sure the ‘Viewing test data’ option is turned on and go the Payments Page to view the transactions. Here is a quick video to demo this. https://www.useloom.com/share/13c443a70ae04dc2bc1b3faf9d974f87
  5. To see the donations in the backend of the STAGING website, please go to this page: https://staging-msra.kinsta.com/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=donation and login with your usual username and password for the live site.
  6. Please note, the recurring donations will still be managed by NAB and the data will be sent via email and then you can manually set it up in NAB Transact as previously.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M.0415 162 271

https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png

HEATH MAGUIRE

On 18 May 2018, at 10:42 am, Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

Hi Patrick and Trish,

Sorry I didn’t get back to you yesterday… But I have some great news for you.

Patrick, to answer your question on the cost to implement the Stripe gateway in the the msra.org.au donation page, we can do this at no extra charge as part of your maintenance plan. It will use up a little time from last month and this month.

It will take us an estimated 8 hours and if you can give us the go-ahead, we will get started and have a test page over to your early to mid week as promised.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png

Hi Heath,

Morning. At your earliest convenience can we discuss on the pros and cons of setting up Stripe on MS Research Australia website? I am available between now and 4.00 pm.

Thanks

<image001.jpg>
